Enable reporting additional information: Enable reporting additional information on a crash (requires restart)

Snap Sources to edge of screen: Fastgør kilder til kanten af skærmen

Double click selects group. Single click: Dobbeltklik for at vælge gruppe. Klik én gang for at vælge element
Navigate to Live tab when going live: Naviger til fanen Live når du går live
Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced: Streaming til en brugerdefineret server er en avanceret funktionalitet. Nogle funktioner i Streamlabs OBS vil muligvis ikke fungere som forventet
Deleting your cache directory will cause: Hvis du sletter cache-mappen, går nogle indstillinger tabt. Slet ikke cache-mappen medmindre du bliver bedt om det af en Streamlabs-medarbejder.
You can not change these settings when y: Du kan ikke ændre disse indstillinger, mens du er live
This feature is intended for overlay des: Denne funktion er beregnet til overlay-designere til at eksportere deres arbejde til vores Tema-Store. Ikke alle kilder eksporteres, brug på egen risiko.
Change the look of Streamlabs OBS with P: Ændr Streamlabs OBS udseende med Prime
Maximum custom destinations has been add: Maximum custom destinations has been added
The Virtual Webcam plugin needs to be up: The Virtual Webcam plugin needs to be updated before it can be started. This requires administrator privileges.
Virtual Webcam requires administrator pr: Virtual Webcam requires administrator privileges to be installed on your system.
If the virtual webcam does not appear in: If the virtual webcam does not appear in other applications, you may need to restart your computer.
Virtual Webcam allows you to display you: Virtual Webcam allows you to display your scenes from Streamlabs OBS in video conferencing software. Streamlabs OBS will appear as a Webcam that can be selected in most video conferencing apps.
Uninstalling Virtual Webcam will remove: Uninstalling Virtual Webcam will remove it as a device option in other applications.
